title: [Medicine] The diabetes and weight loss drug semaglutide significantly reduced symptoms and improved quality of life in people with obesity and the most common form of heart failure in a clinical trial, potentially expanding the drug’s use beyond diabetes and weight loss

[Medicine] Insulin-producing designer cells can be implanted in the body and triggered using music to release insulin to treat diabetes in a new study. Rock music with booming bass like the song from Queen, “We Will Rock You” provided the best insulin response, followed by the soundtrack to The Avengers.
